title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Code Llama, and other LLMs runnable via a simple CLI and REST API on macOS and Linux.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to integrate Ollama models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community package adding Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, admin, model manager) that talks to a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Electron desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper with REPL, prompt templates, conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and autoscaler support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack (Ollama + Open-WebUI + GPU support).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous and reactive APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem to integrate local Ollama models into Rails or scripts.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, completion and embeddings with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing retrieval-augmented generation with Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot app that streams Ollama responses into threads.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Scripts to convert any Hugging Face transformer to Ollama Modelfile format.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within notes.

title: ollama-digitalocean
summary: DigitalOcean 1-Click App image that spins up a GPU droplet with Ollama pre-installed.
